alert.note: Alert for Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 15 at 2:08PM EST until December 18 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of Far Eastern, Interior DownEast, and Penobscot Valley Maine * WHEN...From Friday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Central Penobscot; Central Washington; Interior Hancock; Northern Washington; Southern Penobscot
